TopicTitle: I've discovered a new way to recover a craft

Articles.Content: I was just on the launch pad, and a happened to move my mouse to the top is the altimeter. And BAM, new button! Sorry if this has already been found, but this is the first time I've seen it. This definitely was not in .21.
It is new of .22, and was wrote on the change log.
I found it when i was playing, Thanks to finding it because others may not know.
That is indeed a very cool new feature, it's very satifaying vay to end flight.
Thanks for posting this! Didn't know too

I didn't notice this since I only skim read through the change list. I'd just been thinking how annoying it was going to the tracking station and recovering crafts from there. Thanks for pointing this out!
